display_long_description:
# Welcome to the coolest fun fair in free-to-play VR!

Grab your friends and jump into Oktoberfest VR — the ultimate social playground packed with wild rides, haunted arena, quirky pets, and nonstop mini-games madness. 

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

👀 **What Everyone’s Loving:**

🎢 Epic Rides – Feel the rush on coaster or chill on the Ferris wheel. Smash friends in bumper cars with power-ups and top the leaderboard!

🎯 Mini-Games & Challenges – Test your aim in fair games, toss flying frogs, or jam out in Brass Band Hero!

💀 Spooky Co-op Fun – Survive ghostly chaos in Haunting Grounds with your squad!

🐾 Adopt a Pet – Get a cute sidekick and hunt for hidden treasures!

🧍‍♂️ Style Your Avatar – Go traditional or totally wild — your theme park, your look!
 
🎉 It’s always festival season in Oktoberfest!

Join our fun community on Discord👉  bit.ly/OktoberfestVRDiscord
